home.welcome: Break Through with Technology, Reach for the Future

about-section.title: About Katech - Vietnam
about-section.content:
Not just technology, we deliver value
Technology solutions for a smarter tomorrow
about-section.card-1-content: 500+ Top-tier Team

product-section.title: Products
product-section.content: Konan – An intelligent AI assistant for businesses. Optimizes operational processes, automates tasks, and enhances customer experience.

mission-section.title: Mission
mission-section.subtitle: Pioneering Technology, Creating Digital Value
mission-section.description: To become a leading technology company, turning big technological dreams into reality.

people.title: People
people.description: A youthful, talented, and passionate team

culture.title: Culture
culture.description: A dynamic, creative, and open working environment

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: High-quality, world-class, and innovative products and services

vision-section.title: Leading technology, creating digital value
vision-section.subtitle: Katech – Vietnam will focus on developing technology in two directions: developing platforms and core technologies, and enhancing customer experience and operational efficiency based on technology.

2021.title: Company Founded
2021.description: In 2021, KATECH Technology and Services Joint Stock Company - Vietnam began its strategic entry into the domestic IT market, starting with a technical department of 15 employees.

2022.title: Continuously exploring new markets
2022.description: Continuously exploring new markets, expanding cooperation approaches.

2023.title: Rapid Growth Driven by Youthful Energy
2023.description: Sensitivity to the wave of digital transformation currently underway, implementing it correctly into the flow, which is the catalyst for us to reap sweet results.

2024.title: Accompanying Digital Transformation for a Strong Vietnam
2024.description: Focusing on AI Chatbot investment to concretize strategies and promote growth for businesses. We provide high-quality technology services, affirming our role as a partner in digital transformation and green transformation.

2025.title: Expanding the Tech Ecosystem. Together in the Digital Era
2025.description: Focusing on building and expanding the technology ecosystem, closely connecting software, infrastructure, artificial intelligence and smart data.

team-section.title: Expert Team
team-section.description: The combination of experienced experts and young talents creates a team that is both stable and full of creativity, ready to face any challenges.

core-values-section.title: Core Values
core-values-section.description: At Katech, we believe in the power of teamwork and sustainable development, in which:

autonomy.title: Autonomy
autonomy.description: Open culture - Emphasizing the transfer of power, emphasizing the autonomy and responsibility of each individual in the organization.

connection.title: Connection
connection.description: Dynamic working environment, encouraging the exchange of ideas and mutual support. Katech - Vietnam organizes Retro after each project and weekly seminars.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Encouraging creative thinking, constantly searching for new solutions with incentives for staff to learn and improve their skills.

talent.title: Talent
talent.description: Emphasizing the value of gray matter, creating an environment to maximize the talent's potential.
